animeTitle: Shinmai Maou no Testament: Toujou Basara no Hard Sweet na Nichijou (Dub)
otherNames: Shinmai Maou no Testament OVA, The Testament of Sister New Devil OVA, 新妹魔王の契約者〈テスタメント〉 第13話「東城刃更のハードスウィートな日常」
synopsis: An unaired episode of Shinmai Maou no Testament, bundled with the eighth light novel volume.
